lead_paragraph: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un said on Sunday that the isolated, nuclear-capable country was close to test-launching an intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM).
snippet: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un said on Sunday that the isolated, nuclear-capable country was close to test-launching an intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM)....

headline.main: North Korea's Kim Says Close to Test Launch of ICBM
headline.print_headline: North Korea's Kim Says Close to Test Launch of ICBM
